text:
Blaine was a great communicator and even though we didn't have a chance to meet in person I had a pleasant stay at his place. 

His roommate was lovely, as well as his dog! 

The location was about a 20 minute bus ride from downtown but very easy to get to (as are most places in Austin!)

I recommend this room to anyone looking for a sweet deal. The bed is very comfortable, and the house is very inviting. I can only imagine how lovely the backyard would be should it not be overcast and rainy :)

Thanks Blaine!
title: Great Room Mins to Downtown
